ygData.subject: Yellow?!?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... July 29th-- I talked to Vlad of Avatars of Doom on Karana awhile back. He said should like J.C. said, they ve made the planes extremly hard now. Creatures
ygData.messageBody:
From EQ'Lizer's main news section:

-------------------------------------------------------------
July 29th--

I talked to Vlad of Avatars of Doom on Karana awhile back. He
said should like J.C. said, they've made the planes extremly
hard now. Creatures backstabbing for 400 damage when you try
to portal in. Getting hit can teleport you to other parts of
the zone. He did mention before they made it impossible to get
it about some of the armor. Hopefully he'll send it on in as
well as the rest of his guildmates. Paladin armor is blue.
Cleric armor is purple. Bard armor is yellow. Druid is green
^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
chain. Ranger is green plate. Shaman is grey (not sure).
-------------------------------------------------------------

Yellow? Why yellow? I feel a barrage of coward jokes and
have-a-nice-day jokes coming...

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
